sources.title: The Actor | Full Movie | Intense Crime Thriller | Free Movie
sources.description:
Set in New York City, a struggling actor/part time taxi driver becomes the subject of an FBI investigation for planning to detonate a bomb at a major tourist site.
2017.  Stars: Carl Weyant, Niki Saletta, James Russo

metadata.Plot: It is about a burly film actor who wants to act only in art films but is forced by his family's economic demands to do a string of trashy commercial movies. His tormented wife, infertile and obsessed with having a baby, insists that her husband marry and impregnate a second wife, a deaf-mute Gypsy, to provide them with a child.
metadata.Actors: Akbar Abdi, Azita Hajian, Hamideh Kheirabadi
